Product Designer - Messaging Experience

at Spotify in New York, NY from 2/21/2021

We’re searching for a Product Designer to join one of our New York-based Design teams.

We are looking for an experienced designer to contribute to and partner with the technology and product teams on our consumer-focused messaging experiences. Someone who is enthusiastic about developing strategies based on insights from real people, has the proficiency in their craft to turn these insights into appealingly designed products (both interactions and visuals) and encourages the organization by showing/prototyping what is possible before it is built.

Responsibilities

Iterate upon and create new messaging experiences across the Spotify ecosystem on our current messaging channels (in-app, email, push, and beyond) balancing compelling solutions for our listeners, Spotifiers and our business.
Work with your peers to run messaging experiments and develop processes in a fast-paced environment to change behaviors and drive growth.
Collaborate with our ads team to ensure we are using harmonious solutions and consistent patterns that spark engagement, while broadening the understanding of our consumers and their listening habits.
Think outside of the box to build and execute on broad ideas, turning them into exciting, innovative, and viable solutions for the business that drive revenue.
Work cross-functionally to drive a project forward by planning and breaking down open-ended opportunities into impactful next steps.
Use insights to advise your designs and prove the value of messaging. You have a solid understanding of experimentation frameworks.
Produce an array of divergent, human-focused approaches advised by user needs, business objectives and technical capabilities.

Skills

3-5+ years experience delivering extraordinary design as a UX designer, information architect, interaction designer or similar. Mobile experience is a requirement.
You care about communication and employ storytelling to paint a picture, build common understanding, set up frameworks and brainstorm initial design concepts.
A conceptual and human-centered problem solver. Someone who seeks to understand people’s needs, motivations and behaviors – in order to translate them into impactful results.
Your head is in the clouds while your feet are on the ground. You love thinking big, and at the same time, you know when to apply pixel-perfect attention to detail.
You care about the impact of your work. You have experience tracking usage of the things you build, and using the data collected to verify its efficiency.
An excellent teammate, communicator and facilitator.
Please provide an online portfolio, or PDF that you can share with us. Please be sure to provide any necessary passwords, we cannot advance your application without them.
Please provide a brief explanation in your application of why you are excellent for this role, while highlighting your portfolio.
